review: I bought this hoping I can replace the Chromecast and add the ability to watch Amazon Prime videos too, but whatever the Stick's connection is - it seems weird. I have never had any lags or freezes on any ChromeCast videos (Netflix or Hulu), but the Stick keep freezing and being slow, when playing Netflix or Hulu. On the same network! So I'm actually a bit disappointed...
author: Pearl

review: Amazon Fire TV Stick is a good device to get if you are an Amazon Prime member. It lets you fully utilize all the programs available on Prime and any movies you purchased on Amazon. You can get Hulu and Netflix as apps if you belong to these services so that is worth it too. I have a Roku Purple Box (not HD) I bought last year new and I paid the same amount  ($39.00), but Roku is not making any more of these boxes right now so Fire TV Stick is a good cheap device for streaming.
